mage thaththagema akkage duwath (prema sambandhayak matha wiwaha wi ema wiwahaya asarthaka kara gath ayeki), mage thaththage mithurakuge biridath (wiwaha jiwithaye hala happim mada, demawipiya saranada ahimiwa wesena ayeki), mage ek mithuriyakage maw kenekuth (swa kamaththata wiwaha wi aarthika prashna nisa, danna da sita samiya pitarata sitinniyaki), thawada mage naganiyage mithuriyakage maw kenekuth (nogalapena wiwahayaka badi, bimath samiyath diyaniyan dedenath samaga jiwitha satana asiruwen gena yana ayeki) idura pawasa sitiye apa dedenage kamaththa anuwa thiranayak ganna lesaya.
